snippet: A smartphone or tablet that uses the Apple or Android operating system is all it takes to process credit and debit cards, without the bulky machine that once was required.
abstract: Mobile card readers, small devices that plug into smartphones, allow entrepreneurs, trade show exhibitors and other small-business people to sell more of their products on the road, despite fact that many consumers now carry credit and debit cards instead of cash.
lead_paragraph: A smartphone or tablet that uses the Apple or Android operating system is all it takes to process credit and debit cards, without the bulky machine that once was required.

headline.seo: Mobile Card-Processing Machines for Marketers on the Road
